Children are educated about creationism in primary school R.E.
However they are not taught about the opposing argument "evoloution" until secondary education science classes.

This is at best a wasted opportunity.
At worst unitentional bias.

The education system should introduce children to the fundamentals of creationism and evoloution at the same time to encourage independant thought and ensure they dont accept one theory before even encountering the other.

Teach the basics of evoloution in primary school
